code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./styles.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ItemListManager(){const[items,setItems]=useState([]);const[inputValue,setInputValue]=useState("");const handleAddItem=()=>{if(inputValue.trim()!==""){setItems([...items,inputValue.trim()]);setInputValue("");}};const handleRemoveItem=index=>{const newItems=items.filter((_,i)=>i!==index);setItems(newItems);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item-list-manager",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"header",children:"Item List Manager"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"input-field",type:"text",placeholder:"Enter an item",value:inputValue,onChange:e=>setInputValue(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"add-button",onClick:handleAddItem,children:"Add Item"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"item-list",children:items.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"list-item",children:[item,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"remove-button",onClick:()=>handleRemoveItem(index),children:"Remove"})]},index))})]});}export default ItemListManager;
